channel.title: Test on Peter's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Test on Peter's Blog

item.title: Proxy Test
item.description: socks5 # 监听1080为代理地址 ssh -f -N -D 0.0.0.0:1080 root@127.0.0.1 # test curl -v -k -x "socks5://USER:PASSWORD@HOSTIP:1080" https://baidu.com socat # forward 访问目标服务 socat TCP4-LISTEN:<本地端口>,bind=<监听本机的地址>,reuseaddr,fork TCP:<目标地址>:<目标端口> 3proxy 三方容器： 3128 http, 1080 socks5 $ docker run --rm -d \ -p "3128:3128/tcp" \ -p "1080:1080/tcp" \ tarampampam/3proxy:latest

item.title: Playwright
item.description: image docker pull mcr.microsoft.com/playwright/python:v1.20.0-focal 本地环境 pip install playwright -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple playwright install
